greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of closed walks of length n on the complete graph on 6 nodes from a given node.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Ji Young Choi, A Generalization of Collatz Functions and Jacobsthal Numbers, J. Int. Seq., Vol. 21 (2018), Article 18.5.4.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,5).
formula: a(n) = 5^(n-1) - a(n-1), a(0) = 1. - _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Feb 08 2015
mathematica: k=0;lst={k};Do[k=5^n-k;AppendTo[lst, k], {n, 1, 5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 11 2008 *)
xref: Cf. sequences with the same recurrence form: A001045, A078008, A097073, A115341, A015518, A054878, A015521, A109499, A015531. - _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 11 2008
results.author: _Mitch Harris_, Jun 30 2005
